description: A delicious take on an old-time favourite, that keeps really well in an airtight container.
name: Choc Chip Fig & Maple Pecan Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g salted butter, softened to room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter and sugar maple syrup and vanilla and gradually add beaten egg. Beat until thick and creamy and light brown in colour.
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl, then fold through nuts, figs and chocolate.
Add the dry ingredients to the creamed mix and mix until well combined.
Using a small ice-cream scoop, put about a 1/4 of a cup of the cookie mix for each one and leave about 5 cm apart on a baking tray lined with baking paper

If you like a soft, chewy type of cookie, then bake for about 13 minutes in the preheated oven; if you like a crunchy one, then about 16 -17mins, don't overcook them and burn. When cooked, transfer to a cookie wire cooler and let cool before storing in an airtight jar.
